titleStmt.title: The first lecture, of an introduction to cosmographie, (vvhich is a description of all the world) / read publickly at Sr. Balthazar Gerbier his academy, at Bednall-Greene.
titleStmt.author: Gerbier, Balthazar, Sir, 1592?-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Gartrude Dawson, and are to be sold by Hanna Allen at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
